title: Hyhug Heavy Duty Nylon Anti - Escape Martingale Dog Collar for Large Medium Small Boy and Girl Dogs - Walking Training Daily Use. (Medium, Red)
features: Size: M, adjustable length 14"-21" ( 0.79" width), for the proper fit when your dog wears it, please measure your dog's neck circumference and refer to the size chart picture we provided to choose the right size.

Durable Construction: This martingale dog collar is made of sturdy and high quality nylon material. It also offers a wide variety of color options, and is suitable for dogs of all breeds and sizes, ensuring long-lasting durability.

No Buckle: Martingale dog collars are designed for slip - on wear. They tighten moderately when pulled, with a limited tightening mechanism to prevent over - tightening. They automatically loosen when there's no pull. This gentle control eases dog walking and training

Escape-Proof: This cute collar prevents dogs from escaping and corrects their behaviors. The martingale collar is excellent for training, allowing for gentle control and ensuring a safe and comfortable wearing experience. It's not suitable for tying up dogs!

Colorfast: Our dog collars are professionally dyed. The colors penetrate deep into the fibers and attach firmly. Despite exposure to sunlight, rain, or multiple washes, the colors remain vibrant for a long time, enhancing your dog's wearing experience.
description: Product Description Martingale Dog Collars Here's a gentle reminder: A dog collar is just a training aid. Relying solely on it to correct your dog's behavior won't work. Combine it with positive training, like rewarding and encouraging your dog. This helps your pet understand proper behaviors. Please measure your dog's neck size before ordering Martingale collars for large, medium and small dogs Selecting a collar of the appropriate size for your dog and adjusting it to fit your furry friend perfectly after receiving it is the very first and crucial step in proper collar-wearing. Determine the appropriate size: The measurement of the dog's neck is not the final size of the collar. A suitable collar should allow two fingers to be inserted between the collar and the dog's neck with ease. It should be approximately the neck circumference plus 1.5 to 2.5 inches. Soft, Thick Webbing Soft and smooth, it is thicker than the ribbon of the general dog collar, The touch feels good and the strength is strong enough to resist the strongest and largest dog breeds. It`s the training walking daily use necessary collar This heavy duty martingale collar are suitable for your large 4 legs friends. Whether boy girl male female dog. Hyhug pets focuses on providing high quality,comfortable,safe,durable and stylish collars . The metal parts used are carefully selected to ensure safe and durability and beauty. Every process and sewing detail of the product has undergone rigorous research and handling, will not let you have any accidental scraping damage, we are committed to making you and your furry friend love and safe to use.
